statements: SELECT * FROM user_participation_data;
SELECT user_id, forum_name, participation_level FROM user_participation_data WHERE activity_type = 'posting';
SELECT user_id, forum_name, join_date FROM user_participation_data ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, participation_level, last_participation_date FROM user_participation_data WHERE participation_level > 3;
SELECT forum_name, activity_type, COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM user_participation_data GROUP BY forum_name, activity_type;
SELECT user_id, forum_name, activity_type FROM user_participation_data WHERE participation_level > 5 ORDER BY last_participation_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM user_participation_data WHERE forum_name = 'Tech Forum' AND activity_type = 'Posting'
SELECT user_id, participation_level, join_date FROM user_participation_data WHERE participation_level >= 10 ORDER BY join_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT forum_name FROM user_participation_data WHERE participation_level < 3
SELECT user_id, forum_name, last_participation_date FROM user_participation_data WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM forums
SELECT forum_id, forum_name FROM forums WHERE created_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT forum_id, forum_name FROM forums ORDER BY forum_name ASC
SELECT * FROM user_participation WHERE participation_score > 50
SELECT user_id, COUNT(forum_id) AS forum_count FROM user_participation GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM forums WHERE forum_id = 1
SELECT forum_name FROM forums WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT forum_id, forum_name FROM forums ORDER BY forum_name DESC
SELECT MAX(participation_score) FROM user_participation WHERE forum_id = 2
SELECT forum_name, COUNT(*) FROM forums INNER JOIN user_participation ON forums.forum_id = user_participation.forum_id GROUP BY forum_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM user_participation;
SELECT username, email FROM user_participation WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM forum_discussions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT topic FROM forum_discussions WHERE user_id='123456' AND topic LIKE '%database%';
SELECT activity_name, start_date FROM group_activities WHERE end_date < NOW();
SELECT * FROM user_participation WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT username, email FROM user_participation ORDER BY creation_date DESC
SELECT topic, created_at FROM forum_discussions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT activity_name, start_date, end_date FROM group_activities WHERE start_date < '2022-05-01' AND end_date > '2022-04-01'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(discussion_id) AS discussion_count FROM forum_discussions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(discussion_id) > 3
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT forum_name, category FROM forums ORDER BY forum_id DESC
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE post_date < NOW()
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM activities
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnSmith';
SELECT forum_name, category FROM forums ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM activities WHERE user_id = 1 AND activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT forum_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY forum_id HAVING total_posts > 10 ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_content FROM Posts WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Users LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7);
SELECT * FROM Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Topics.topic_title, Posts.post_content FROM Topics INNER JOIN Posts ON Topics.topic_id = Posts.post_id;
SELECT Users.username, Replies.reply_content FROM Users INNER JOIN Replies ON Users.user_id = Replies.user_id WHERE Users.username LIKE 'A%';
